summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4466 for the improvement of 26th Avenue West, from Elmore Street to a point 300 feet south of Thurman Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52634, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
